Name: Stela of Ameni
Description: Tall rectangular stela with rounded top and several registers. Underneath the lunette with two udjat-eyes are three horizontal lines of text containing the offering formula. Underneath them, a man and woman are kneeling in front of a heavily laden offering table. The lower half of the stela has been divided into four registers depicting three women and one man kneeling in front of offering tables. Each of them is holding a lotus flower to his or her face. The carved texts were originally painted green. The edges of the stela are slightly damaged.
